name: nativescript-in-app-notifications
description: In app notifications plugin for NativeScript.

scripts.dev.ios: npm run preparedemo && npm run reset.ios && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.dev.android: npm run preparedemo && npm run reset.android && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.reset.ios: cd demo && tns platform remove ios && tns platform add ios
scripts.reset.android: cd demo && tns platform remove android && tns platform add android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-in-app-notifications && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && tns platform add ios && tns platform add android
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
